calculations.name: Change Initial Cash USD (abs)
calculations.tableau_expression: ABS([Initial Cash USD T]) - ABS([Initial Cash USD T -1])

calculation_context.Expression: ABS([Initial Cash USD T]) - ABS([Initial Cash USD T -1])

calculated_fields.Initial Cash USD T -1:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [MAX_DATE -1day]= [RpDate] then [Ut. US MM] else 0 END)
else if [End DATE - 1day] = [RpDate] then [Ut. US MM] else 0 END END
calculated_fields.Initial Cash USD T:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] THEN [Ut. US MM] else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then [Ut. US MM] else 0 END END
calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date])
when 1 then [Max Date]-2
when 2 then [Max Date]-3
else [Max Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.End DATE - 1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Parameters].[End Date])
when 1 then [Parameters].[End Date]-2
when 2 then [Parameters].[End Date]-3
else [Parameters].[End Date]-1
end
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
